seo: 用友U8 Cloud,SQL注入漏洞,复现,XVE-2024-4628
summary: 检测用友U8 Cloud MeasureQueryByToolAction是否存在SQL注入漏洞，通过构造特定请求并检测响应时间来判断漏洞是否存在
summary_en: Detect whether there is an SQL injection vulnerability in Yonyou U8 Cloud MeasureQueryByToolAction by constructing specific requests and checking the response time to determine if the vulnerability exists
